## Capabilities Delivered

```python
from blueprint import parse_file, validate, create_execution_plan

# Parse any Blueprint
bp = parse_file("docs/MASTER_ROADMAP.md")  # or .json

# Validate (catches cycles, missing deps)
result = validate(bp)
# ‚Üí ‚úÖ Valid with 8 warnings

# Schedule with parallelization
plan = create_execution_plan(bp)
# ‚Üí 4 groups, max parallelism 2, 2 human-required tasks
```

## Technical Notes

- String literals in heredocs: use `chr(10)` for newlines
- Parser handles emoji status markers via lookup map
- TimeoutAction parsing tolerant of "ABORT with instructions"
- Scheduler uses DFS topological sort with level detection
- Validator returns warnings (not errors) for interface mismatches
